divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the bathroom and saw a bright light outdoors and it was coming from the sky and i look up and it was a odd shaped thing that had every possible color ive ever seen, then the light whent off and it was hovering low to the ground and suddenly it sped off faster than anything i ever saw.
Summary: Stayed low to ground and suddenly sped off
trends: There have been 127 other sightings in San Francisco
There was one other sighting in San Francisco on or around June 29th 2007
